Docs.param: The number of bytes for each row of pixels.
A dictionary of pixel buffer attributes. This parameter is optional (pass null to not specify anything).
Docs.summary: Create a pixel buffer of a given size and format containing raw image data from an array of bytes.
Docs.returns: A newly created pixel buffer, or null of if the pixel buffer couldn't be created.

Docs.param: The number of bytes for each row of pixels.
A dictionary of pixel buffer attributes. This parameter is optional (pass null to not specify anything).
An output parameter that returns the error code if the pixel buffer couldn't be created (or Success if the pixel buffer was created successfully).
Docs.summary: Create a pixel buffer of a given size and format containing raw image data from an array of bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBuffer Create (int width, int height, MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelFormatType pixelFormatType, byte[][] planes, int[] planeWidths, int[] planeHeights, int[] planeBytesPerRow, MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBufferAttributes pixelBufferAttributes);

.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBuffer Create(int32 width, int32 height, valuetype MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelFormatType pixelFormatType, unsigned int8[][] planes, int32[] planeWidths, int32[] planeHeights, int32[] planeBytesPerRow, class MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBufferAttributes pixelBufferAttributes) cil managed

public static MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBuffer Create (nint width, nint height, MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelFormatType pixelFormatType, byte[][] planes, nint[] planeWidths, nint[] planeHeights, nint[] planeBytesPerRow, MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBufferAttributes pixelBufferAttributes);

.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBuffer Create(valuetype System.nint width, valuetype System.nint height, valuetype MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelFormatType pixelFormatType, unsigned int8[][] planes, valuetype System.nint[] planeWidths, valuetype System.nint[] planeHeights, valuetype System.nint[] planeBytesPerRow, class MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBufferAttributes pixelBufferAttributes) cil managed

Docs.param: The pixel buffer image data. This is an array (whose length is the number of planes) of byte arrays (of the raw image data for each plane).
An array of widths, specifying the width of each plane. The number of widths must be the same as the number of planes.
An array of heights, specifying the height of each plane. The number of heights must be the same as the number of planes.
An array of numbers, specifying the bytes per row of each plane. The number of numbers must be the same as the number of planes.
A dictionary of pixel buffer attributes. This parameter is optional (pass null to not specify anything).
Docs.summary: Create a pixel buffer of a given size and format containing raw planar image data from array of byte arrays.
Docs.returns: A newly created pixel buffer, or null of if the pixel buffer couldn't be created.

Docs.param: The pixel buffer image data. This is an array (whose length is the number of planes) of byte arrays (of the raw image data for each plane).
An array of widths, specifying the width of each plane. The number of widths must be the same as the number of planes.
An array of heights, specifying the height of each plane. The number of heights must be the same as the number of planes.
An array of numbers, specifying the bytes per row of each plane. The number of numbers must be the same as the number of planes.
A dictionary of pixel buffer attributes. This parameter is optional (pass null to not specify anything).
An output parameter that returns the error code if the pixel buffer couldn't be created (or Success if the pixel buffer was created successfully).
Docs.summary: Create a pixel buffer of a given size and format containing raw planar image data from array of byte arrays.
Docs.returns: A newly created pixel buffer, or null of if the pixel buffer couldn't be created.

Docs.summary: Type identifier for the MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBuffer type.

remarks.para: The returned token is the CoreFoundation type identifier (CFType) that has been assigned to this class.
This can be used to determine type identity between different CoreFoundation objects.
You can retrieve the type of a CoreFoundation object by invoking the on the native handle of the object

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVReturn Lock(valuetype MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVOptionFlags lockFlags) cil managed

Docs.summary: Locks the storage for the pixel buffer.
Docs.remarks: You must call this method to access the pixel buffer from the CPU. Calls to this method must be balanced with calls to . If the lockFlags contains CVPixelBufferLock.ReadOnly, you must also pass this value to Unlock.
